go.versionsNewScript: Invoke-WebRequest https://api.github.com/repos/golang/go/git/refs/tags | ConvertFrom-Json | % { $_.ref -replace 'refs/tags/go', '' } | ? { $_ -match '^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$' } | ? { [version]$_ -lt [version]'1.21' } | Sort-Object { [version]$_ } -Descending     # Alternatively, use: https://go.dev/dl/?mode=json&include=all
